name: shyle
description: Shyle is a modern, responsive CSS framework with custom JavaScript components, inspired by Bootstrap. It offers enhanced features, flexibility, and simplicity for building web interfaces. Whether you're building a small project or a large-scale application, Shyle provides the tools you need to create beautiful, responsive layouts with ease.
author: dudushy

scripts.build: npm run build:scss && npm run build:ts && npm run build:js
